publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4064 Patrick Harvie: Congratulations for Glasgow’s Fairtrade Status—That the Parliament congratulates all of Glasgow on achieving Fairtrade City status during Fairtrade Fortnight; notes that businesses, charities, schools, Glasgow City Council, the voluntary sector and individuals worked together to achieve this; recognises that Fairtrade’s high social and environmental standards make a real difference to the lives of producers in developing countries, and encourages everyone to use the services of organisations in the Glasgow Fairtrade Business Directory. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4064 Congratulations for Glasgow’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 7 March 2006) Bruce Crawford*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Robin Harper*, Brian Adam*, Nora Radcliffe*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Sandra White*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Tommy Sheridan*, Bill Butler*, Chris Ballance*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-4064 Congratulations for Glasgow’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 7 March 2006) Rosie Kane*, Margaret Jamieson*, Irene Oldfather*, Alex Neil*

S2M-4064 Patrick Harvie: Congratulations for Glasgow’s Fairtrade Status—That the Parliament congratulates all of Glasgow on achieving Fairtrade City status during Fairtrade Fortnight; notes that businesses, charities, schools, Glasgow City Council, the voluntary sector and individuals worked together to achieve this; recognises that Fairtrade’s high social and environmental standards make a real difference to the lives of producers in developing countries, and encourages everyone to use the services of organisations in the Glasgow Fairtrade Business Directory. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Bruce Crawford, Jackie Baillie, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Robin Harper, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Rob Gibson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Ms Sandra White, Eleanor Scott, Mr Mark Ruskell, Tommy Sheridan, Bill Butler, Chris Ballance, Mark Ballard, Rosie Kane, Margaret Jamieson, Irene Oldfather, Alex Neil, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4064 Congratulations for Glasgow’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 7 March 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4064 Congratulations for Glasgow’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 7 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4064 Congratulations for Glasgow’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 7 March 2006) Pauline McNeill*
